price: Na vyake Yeye vilivyo mbinguni na katika ardhi. Vyote vinamt'ii Yeye.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
